System overview: A logistics platform coordinates autonomous forklifts, warehouse inventory, and fleet routing for delivery trucks.
Objectives: prevent collisions in the warehouse, maintain accurate inventory, and deliver on time.
Operating environment: indoor warehouse with Wi-Fi dead zones and outdoor delivery routes with traffic.
Actors: warehouse supervisor, forklift operator, and dispatch manager.
Interfaces: LiDAR sensors, warehouse management system, and vehicle telematics.
Assumptions: forklifts operate below 5 km/h indoors and GPS is available outdoors.
